org.apache.river.test.impl.end2end.e2etest

Interface SmartInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.jini.core.constraint.RemoteMethodControl

    public interface SmartInterface
extends net.jini.core.constraint.RemoteMethodControl
    The interface implemented by the smart proxy. All calls are forwarded to the underlying RMI stub with the exception of the countEndpoints method.

    • Method Summary

      • callAfterUnexport

        void callAfterUnexport()
                throws RemoteException
        A method to be called after an unexport has occured. This call should always fail. It was not necessary to define a special method for this test; it was for the sake of clarity.
        Throws:
        RemoteException
